{{dcl|since=c++20|num=1|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits, class Duration &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::sys_time&lt;Duration&gt;&amp; tp );
}}
{{dcl|since=c++20|num=2|
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits, class Duration &gt;
std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT, Traits&gt;&amp; os,
                const std::chrono::sys_days&amp; tp );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Outputs {{c|tp}} into the stream {{c|os}}.

@1@ Equivalent to:
{{source|1=
return os &lt;&lt; std::format(os.getloc(), STATICALLY-WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L%F %T}"), tp);
}}
where {{c|STATICALLY_WIDEN&lt;CharT&gt;("{:L%F %T}")}} is {{c|"{:L%F %T}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|char}}, and {{c|L"{:L%F %T}"}} if {{tt|CharT}} is {{c|wchar_t}}.&lt;br&gt;
{{cpp/enable if|{{c|std::chrono::treat_as_floating_point_v&lt;typename Duration::rep&gt;}} is {{c|false}} and {{c|Duration(1) &lt; std::chrono::days(1)}}}}.
@2@ Equivalent to {{c|os &lt;&lt; std::chrono::year_month_day(tp);}}.
